title: Filthy Farm Jobs | Philip Learns to Milk Cows | S1E2

tasks.task: Conducting a dairy cow milking process.
subtasks: Changing into appropriate work attire.
Familiarizing oneself with the milking machine and its operation.
Properly applying a pre-dip solution to the cow's udder.
Drying the cow's udder with towels to prepare for milking.
Using the milking machine to extract milk from the cow.
Managing the cow's movement and behavior during milking.
Cleaning and maintaining the milking apparatus.
Ensuring proper hygiene and health standards for cows.
Managing the timing and frequency of milking sessions.
Monitoring milk production and quality.
Maintaining the milking environment (e.g., stalls, water sources, feed availability).
Communicating with legislators and government affairs.
Providing training and supervision to new employees.
Demonstrating farm practices and operational procedures.
Engaging in advocacy for the dairy industry.

tasks.task: Conduct the milking process on a dairy farm.
subtasks: Put on appropriate work clothes.
Apply pre-dip solution to the cow's udder.
Dry the cow's udder with towels.
Position the milking machine, attaching it to the udder.
Operate the milking machine to collect milk.
Inspect the collected milk.
Manage any 'present' left by the cow.
Ensure the cows are healthy and properly housed.
Schedule and perform milking at appropriate times.
Maintain farm equipment and cleanliness.
Conduct tours for legislative visitors and advocates.

tasks.task: Conduct a training session for a new employee (the person being shown around).
subtasks: Demonstrate the milking process.
Explain farm management practices.
Teach proper cow handling and machine operation.
